attributes.action: introduce new legislation to ban the production of non- biodegradable or non-recyclable carrier bags.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If biodegradable and recyclable carrier bags are all that is on offer, people will have no choice but to use them. Introducing taxes is not enough and neither are the incentives that are in place to persuade people to re-use their bags.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/longlifebags/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
